notification_security.upem.fr.securitynotification.network

Class NetworkService

  • java.lang.Object
    • IntentService
      • notification_security.upem.fr.securitynotification.network.NetworkService

  • public class NetworkService
extends IntentService
    An IntentService subclass for handling asynchronous task requests in a service on a separate handler thread.

    helper methods. EXTRA_ERROR_CODE

    • Method Detail

      • startChangeAccessAction

        public static void startChangeAccessAction(Context context,
                                           boolean isDirect)
        Starts this service to perform Change Access with the given mode. If the service is already performing a task ths action will be queued.
        Parameters:
        context - the context invoking this method.
        isDirect - true if the current NetworkService has to send local broadcasts to contact the view. false when it has to prepare a new notification, which will launch the view activity when it is clicked.
        See Also:
        IntentService

      • startConnectAction

        public static void startConnectAction(Context context,
                                      java.lang.String logging,
                                      java.lang.String pin)
        Starts this service to perform Connect Action with the given parameters. If the service is already performing a task ths action will be queued.
        Parameters:
        context - the context invoking this method.
        logging - the logging to connect the app.
        pin - the pin associated with the logging to connect the app.
        See Also:
        IntentService

      • startSignUpAction

        public static void startSignUpAction(Context context,
                                     java.lang.String firstName,
                                     java.lang.String lastName,
                                     java.lang.String email,
                                     java.lang.String phone,
                                     java.lang.String PIN)
        Starts this service to perform SignUp Action with the given parameters. If the service is already performing a task ths action will be queued.
